casebody.data:
No. 1222,

Misc.

Allen v. LaVallee, Warden. Petitioner pro se. Louis J. Lefkowitz, Attorney General of New York, Paxton Blair, Solicitor General, and Winifred C. Stanley, Assistant Attorney General, for respondent.

Appellate Division, Supreme Court of New York, Fourth Judicial Department. Certiorari denied.
